author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Slim Jeans 10 days fare deal launched by Jin Air - Travelandtourworld.comTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Slim Jeans 10 days fare deal launched by Jin Air
Jin Air , a representative of Korea LCC, is launching the Slim Jeans fare deal which guarantees reasonable fares flying to Korea.
The promotion will last for 10 days, starting from October 5, 2015 to October 14, 2015, and will be available to passengers boarding from October 25, 2015 to January 31, 2016, except for some peak days.
Jin Air’s seasonal early bird promotion, Slim Jeans Fare Deal, targets those who plan to travel in two to three months after flight reservation. The fare deal offers an added discount on top of the regular discount. The Slim Jeans promotion was held earlier this year for customers to visit Korea in May, and it is the second Slim Jeans promotion.
Slim Jeans will be opened to a total of 17 international destinations, including flights from Sapporo, Okinawa, Fukuoka, Osaka, Hong Kong, Macau, Bangkok, Cebu, Clark, Da Nang, Vientiane and Kota Kinabalu to Incheon. It also includes two flights from Shanghai and Xi’an to Jeju and three flights to Pusan from Osaka, Cebu and Clark.
Highlights on the lowest round trip fares for Slim Jeans promotion include (exclude surcharge and taxes):
Hong Kong – Incheon for HKD 950; Macau – Incheon for MOP 1,050; Bangkok – Incheon for THB 6,500; Da Nang – Incheon for USD260; Osaka – Incheon for JPY 11,000; Cebu – Incheon for USD250; Xi’an – Jeju for CNY 740; and Shanghai – Jeju for CNY 640.
Starting from October 5, customers can begin purchasing tickets through Jin Air’s website and mobile application (Eng. Version).
